meanings.definition: A board or molding at the base of a wall.
meanings.sent1: The baseboard along the wall was painted white.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally kicked the baseboard while moving the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat used the baseboard as a scratching post.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as straight and neat as a freshly installed baseboard.
meanings.sent5: The baseboard, like a loyal guardian, protected the wall from scuff marks.

meanings.definition: The lowest part or edge of something.
meanings.sent1: The baseboard of the mountain was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: Water dripped down from the baseboard of the leaky pipe.
meanings.sent3: The baseboard of the cake was the most delicious part.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed off the baseboard of the canyon.
meanings.sent5: The baseboard of the cliff jutted out precariously over the sea.
